name: Gladiator's Triumphus
title: Unbeaten: Gladiator's Triumphus
desc: "Only in moments of victory could the slave have a taste of what it felt like to be a master. But the cost of this vain aspiration was for the faint glow of freedom to be shrouded by darkness.\nOn the day of his triumph, the gladiator finally caught a glimpse of the world outside his cell. He was a step closer to freedom."

skills.desc: When the character uses a Normal Attack: Spend 1 less Elemental Die if you have no more than 2 cards in your Hand. (Once per Round) (A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

inPlayDescription: When the character uses a Normal Attack: Spend 1 less Elemental Die if you have no more than 2 cards in your Hand. (Once per Round)
